item.title: 0. Preparation
item.description: Things to get sorted before we go Bikes need to be road registered and licenced beyond the Expedition end date.

item.title: 1. Getting there
item.description: A two day cross-country getting the crew, vehicles and riders to Henties bay (1,930kms) - our starting point of the Expedition.

item.title: 3. Day 1 - Henties to Spitzkoppe
item.description: Up the Umaruru river We will confirm the conditions of the riverbeds prior to doing this and other sections of the route, but assuming conditions are good, we’ll travel about 80kms inside the Umaruru riverbed, hang right and head down to Spitzkoppe.

item.title: index
item.description: Namibia 2026 Expedition CONTENTS0. Preparation1. Getting there2. Daily schedule3. Day 1 - Henties to Spitzkoppe4. Day 2 - Spitzkoppe to Brandberg5.

item.title: 4. Day 2 - Spitzkoppe to Brandberg
item.description: Back up to the Umaruru river, Uis & White Lady We head back up to the Umaruru river on a different route.

item.title: 29. Major river sections & crossings
item.description: Important Because we’ll be travelling on motorcycles and backup vehicles and crossing many rivers in Namibia (or southern Africa), having up-to-date information on river levels and flow / flood risk is very important.

item.title: 29. Significant Rivers sections riding or crossing
item.description: Important Because we’ll be travelling on motorcycles and backup vehicles and crossing many rivers in Namibia (or southern Africa), having up-to-date information on river levels and flow / flood risk is very important.
